main event: A witness in Bloomington, Indiana reported seeing a bright, streaking light in the sky on July 4, 1966.
interesting points: The witness initially thought the object was an airplane with landing gear descending for a landing, but realized it was something else when it made a tight circle around a transmitting tower.
The witness and others drove over to the tower after the object went down behind the trees, but they could not find any sign of it.
The witness had previously been investigating similar sightings of unexplained lights in the Bloomington area.
The witness had another UFO sighting in Springfield, Ohio in December 1965.
The witness was with another person who also saw the object on July 4, 1966.
